DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine new investigational diabetes drug safe effective treat people Type II diabetes mellitus high HbA1c FPG ( fast plasma glucose ) level . The HbA1c test , also call hemoglobin A1c test glycated hemoglobin test , measurement average amount sugar blood last 2 3 month . FPG test measure amount sugar blood 8 hour fast .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety And Efficacy Of An Investigational Diabetes Drug In Poorly Controlled Type II Diabetics
DOC.criteria: Laboratory result HbA1c > 11 % FPG > 270mg/dL Clinical diagnosis Type II diabetes Prior treatment diet and/or exercise alone , less 15 day prior treatment oral antidiabetic medication insulin . Women pregnant
